name: ajve-civ
description: Guide an engineered people as they settle an alien world.

scripts.test: jshint bin lib test index.js && mocha -R spec --recursive
scripts.coveralls: jscoverage lib cov-lib && COVERAGE=true mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter --recursive | coveralls
scripts.cov: jscoverage lib cov-lib && COVERAGE=true mocha -R json-cov --recursive > coverage.json
scripts.cov-html: jscoverage lib cov-lib && COVERAGE=true mocha -R html-cov --recursive > coverage.html
scripts.todo: grep -r TODO bin lib test index.js
